ID: C10YMPW_00
From: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com>; Retail Operations CGR <Retail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-29 18:22
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE CLOSURE | Makeup Forever Al Ain Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Please be informed that the last trading date of Makeup Forever Al Ain Mall will be on Wednesday 24th September 2025 at 10 PM. And the hoarding installation will commence on same day after trading hours.

 

We have prepared the Store Closure checklist for this store to ensure completion of all tasks prior our handover to the mall. Each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on-time. 

 

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach the designated Local Ops, Mohamed Bata 050 8158 454/ Khaled Mostafa 050 970 6657 at any time.

 

All the best, 

Retail Operations UAE
